comment: I think the only reason people did not like this class was because people expected an easy A. This class you had to put in effort to get an A but I had a blast in this class. It was the only fun class I have ever taken. You have a lot of group projects but you get to know everyone well so its not awkward once you get passed the first few weeks.
DO NOT TAKE. If you have to, goodluck. Worst class, so much work for a 2000 level class. It had more homework/work than any of my other classes. AVOID AVOID AVOID
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: All I can say is good luck, try to avoid. You'll need it. More work than my 4000-level class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: This class required more papers than my english classes, she is very by the book and is a very tough grader. There is a 8-10 page paper due at the end of the semester based off of a group project. Avoid this class at all costs, and do not dare take your phone out during class. She makes you feel like you are in middle school again. DO NOT TAKE!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She's adept at her job. She is very uptight, and strict. She never lets students try explaining certain parts of a lesson, as I knew some of the material, and yet she obviously blew me off telling I didn't know it. She's also a paranoid technophobe. Register at your own risk.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Make sure to leave an hour opening before an after this class in your schedule this was a great class you will enjoy it if you work for it.
Extremely easy as long as you put some effort into the course.  You have to do your labs.

Kicks our butts into shape in Water Aerobics. Do not buy that stupid book though-seek someone who will give it too you. It is NOT worth the $40 something dollars. Do, however, study for the midterm and do the project.

PE is supposed to be a joke.  she makes it hard.  read the book, class notes are not that impt.  do all labs, and make sure you pay close attention to when she gives projects and their due dates!!! get another HPS teacher

I was bothered that product issues she discussed on her own were not well researched. Research if it sounds funny. I found one of her statements on urban legend. Study your book. Even small print. Ask about the projects. Not always clear on these things.

The only reason this teacher gets a 1 grade is because she gives the most work out of all the HPS teachers.  Projects, journals, comprehensive exams, you name it and she's going to assign it.  HPS is supposed to be a joke, not a nightmare!
Seems hard for PE. Goes into extreme detail.
very nice woman, cares about students health
